entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a wizard with a lightning-shaped scar on his forehead. He has brilliant green eyes and jet-black hair that is always untidy.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl who was padlocked inside her cage by Uncle Vernon to stop her carrying messages to the wizarding world.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is described as large and neckless with an enormous black moustache. He has a matter of deepest shame having a wizard in the family.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is horse-faced and bony.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is blond, pink and porky.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's family member.
Aunt Petunia is Harry's family member.
